title: Hot Fire Burning: An Alpha Firefighter Romance
description: Amy:Moving in with my sister after leaving my small town is the biggest change I've even made in my life so far. Who could've thought that the first night at her apartment there's going to be a fire and I'm going to be saved by the hottest firefighter ever?Owen:I'm a life-loving bachelor with little time for relationships. But lately, it feels like something is missing from my life. I never imagined that the angel I saved from the fire will turn my life upside down. Beautiful and smart, she's all I even wanted. And I'm going to make her mine.Hot Fire Burning as a short steamy romance with alpha bad-boy firefighter and smart and independent heroine. HEA guaranteed!
author: Anne R. Boyden
